title: Infinity

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Curse a player, giving them vulnerable defence. The following night, curse their direct living neighbours.
- Stun a player, redirecting them to target themselves. The following night, stun their direct living neighbours.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only use one ability per night. If you manually curse or stun a player, all current curses or stuns will reset.
- If you are attacked at night, at the start of the following night, all curses and stuns will reset and target that player. If there multiple players, one is randomly picked.
- Players will know they are cursed or stunned, unless it was started from an attacker.
- Curses and stuns disappear when you die, unless it was started from an attacker.
- With the Necronomicon, players die when they are cleared of being cursed or stunned.
